projects.title: Feels App
projects.description: Collect temperatures, medications, and symptoms for your children. This information can be shown to your doctor.

projects.title: Local Weather
projects.description: Weather App that displays your current conditions along with the weather for the next 5 days.
projects.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, Bootstrap, Firebase, Version Control with Github

projects.title: Solar System
projects.description: Solar System provides information about our planets. Each planet provides a detailed description and information about moons and gases.
projects.technologiesUsed: Javascript, XML Http Request and JSON, CSS
